General.Name: Touax SCA
General.Description: Touax SCA engages in the operational leasing, sale, and management of mobile standardized equipment worldwide. The company operates through Freight Railcars, River Barges, and Shipping Containers divisions. It also offers freight railcars, including intermodal wagons, car-carrier railcars, coil carrying railcars, sliding wall wagons, hopper cars, and powder railcars. In addition, the company engages in leasing of river barges to logistics and industrial groups, as well as sells barge. Further, it is involved in fleet management; sale and lease back of river fleets; and provision of technical expertise related to river transport. The company manufactures and sells modular constructions, industrialized buildings, and prefabricated elements. As of December 31, 2022, the company owned and managed a fleet of 385,141 twenty-foot equivalent unit containers. Touax SCA was founded in 1853 and is headquartered in La Défense, France.
